short_definition: An agreement between two or more people that creates an obligation to do or not to do a particular thing.
long_definition_html: An agreement between two or more people that creates an obligation to do or not to do a particular thing.
long_definition_markdown: An agreement between two or more people that creates an obligation to do or not to do a particular thing.
long_definition_text: An agreement between two or more people that creates an obligation to do or not to do a particular thing.
